physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Symptoms resolved after 7 days of treatment with ampicillin/sulbactam.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Temperature increased during plasmapheresis, but no infection was noted upon examination.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient felt flushed and weak but returned to normal health shortly after.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Physical examination unremarkable; no evidence of infection at the Hickman catheter site.
